stimulusHtml: Which of the following is an equation of the line tangent to the graph of x 2 − 3 x y = 10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@414B@ at the point ( 1 , − 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F85@ ?
choicesHtml: y + 3 = − 11 ( x − 1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@436F@
